name: Lobster Bacon Jalapeno Poppers
author: Newcook
summary: This is great. I love this recipe.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
3 large jalapeno peppers, halved lengthwise and seeded
directions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Bring a large pot of water to a boil over high heat
Boil lobsters until they turn bright red and the claws are easily pulled off, 20 to 25 minutes
Break lobster claws and tail removing as much meat as possible
Roughly chop the meat and transfer to a bowl
Mix melted butter, chives, and hot sauce with the lobster; season with salt and pepper
Spoon mixture into the jalapeno halves and wrap each tightly with a slice of bacon, wrapping three times around each popper and trimming bacon so there is no excess hanging off the edges
Bake in preheated oven until bacon is browned, about 15 minutes
